debates.showAs: Commissions of Investigation (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Commissions of Investigation (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Commissions of Investigation (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Commissions of Investigation Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Choimisiúin Imscrúdúcháin, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Responsibility of Social Media Platforms (Defamation Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law relating to defamation, in order to allow judgements of defamation be made against the social media platform on which the defamatory utterances were made when the social media platform in question is unable to produce the identity of the person who made the utterances, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le clúmhilleadh, chun go bhféadfar breithiúnais chlúmhillte a thabhairt i gcoinne an ardáin meán sóisialta a ndearnadh an chaint chlúmhillteach air nuair nach mbeidh an t-ardán meán sóisialta a bheidh i gceist in ann céannacht an duine a rinne an chaint a thabhairt ar aird, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Responsibility of Social Media Platforms (Defamation Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhreagracht Ardán Meán Sóisialta (Leasú ar Dhlí an Chlúmhillte), 2022

debates.showAs: Coercion of a Minor (Misuse of Drugs Amendment) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Coercion of a Minor (Misuse of Drugs Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law relating to the misuse of a controlled substance and for those purposes to amend the Misuse of Drugs Act 1977 to criminalise the act of causing or coercing a minor to be in possession of a controlled substance, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le mí-úsáid substainte rialaithe agus chun na gcríoch sin do leasú an Achta um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí, 1977 chun coir a dhéanamh den ghníomh arb éard é a chur faoi deara do mhionaoiseach, nó comhéigean a dhéanamh ar mhionaoiseach, substaint rialaithe a bheith ina sheilbh nó ina seilbh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Coercion of a Minor (Misuse of Drugs Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhéigean a Dhéanamh ar Mhionaoiseach (Leasú a bhaineann le Mí-Úsáid Drugaí), 2022

debates.showAs: River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
River Shannon Management Agency Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create a single competent authority to co-ordinate flood risk and management along the River Shannon and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú údarás inniúil aonair chun priacal agus bainistiú tuile a chomhordú feadh Abhainn na Sionainne agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghníomhaireacht Bainistíochta Abhainn na Sionainne, 2020

debates.showAs: Sexual Offences (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to amend the Criminal Law (Rape) Act 1981 (as amended) to enable complainants to be heard and legally represented in relation to applications to adduce evidence about the clothing worn by a complainant at the time of the alleged offence; to amend the provisions in respect of previous sexual history evidence and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um an Dlí Coiriúil (Banéigean), 1981 (arna leasú) chun a chumasú gearánaigh a éisteacht agus ionadaíocht dhlíthiúil a bheith acu i ndáil le hiarratais ar fhianaise a thabhairt ar aird maidir leis na héadaí arna gcaitheamh ag an ngearánach tráth an chiona líomhnaithe; do leasú na bhforálacha i leith fianaise ar stair ghnéasach roimhe sin agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Taisceadán (Valuable Property Register) Bill 2019: Second Stage [Private Members]
Taisceadán (Valuable Property Register) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of Taisceadán, a Register of items of personal property to be managed by An Garda Síochána to assist in the identification of items of personal property, for the purposes of investigation of crime, for the repatriation of items of property and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Taisceadán a bhunú, arb éard a bheidh ann Clár d’ítimí maoine pearsanta ar a ndéanfaidh an Garda Síochána bainistiú chun cuidiú a thabhairt maidir le hítimí maoine pearsanta a shainaithint, d’fhonn coireacht a imscrúdú agus d'fhonn ítimí maoine a athdhúichiú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Local Government (Water Pollution) (Amendment) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Local Government (Water Pollution) (Amendment) Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Local Government (Water Pollution) (Amendment) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Local Government (Water Pollution) (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the provisions of the Local Government (Water Pollution) Act 1977 to provide for the granting of discharge licences by a water services authority for the development of single houses; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú fhorálacha an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil (Truailliú Uisce), 1977 chun foráil a dhéanamh maidir le húdarás seirbhísí uisce do dheonú ceadúnais scardaidh i ndáil le tithe aonair a fhorbairt; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Forestry (Planning Permission) (Amendment) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Forestry (Planning Permission) (Amendment) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Forestry (Planning Permission) (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the provisions of the Forestry Act 2014 to provide for planning permission for all forestry developments over 5 hectares; to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú fhorálacha an Achta Foraoiseachta, 2014 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cead pleanála do gach forbairt foraoiseachta os cionn 5 heicteár; do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Island Fisheries (Heritage Licence) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Island Fisheries (Heritage Licence) Bill 2017: Restoration to Order Paper
Island Fisheries (Heritage Licence) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Island Fisheries (Heritage Licence) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Island Fisheries (Heritage Licence) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the issuing of heritage licences to island fishermen to facilitate the continuance of traditional fishing practices on ireland's offshore islands; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceadúnais oidhreachta a eisiúint chuig iascairí oileáin chun go n-éascófar leanúint de chleachtais iascaireachta thraidisiúnta ar na hoileáin amach ó chósta na hÉireann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Iascach Oileáin (Ceadúnas Oidhreachta), 2017

debates.showAs: Rural Equality Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Rural Equality Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Rural Equality Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that regard be had by public bodies to the desirability of reducing socio-economic and other inequalities suffered by those in rural Ireland, to provide for the carrying out of rural impact assessments in respect of measures that are likely to have a significant socio-economic impact or effect on rural Ireland and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun go mbeidh aird ag comhlachtaí poiblí ar a inmhianaithe atá sé neamhionannas socheacnamaíoch agus eile arna fhulaingt ag daoine faoin tuath in Éirinn a laghdú, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le measúnachtaí tionchair tuaithe a dhéanamh I leith bearta ar dóigh tionchar suntasach a bheith acu nó éifeacht shuntasach a bheith leo ar an tuath in Éirinn agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Petroleum and Other Minerals Development (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Petroleum and Other Minerals Development Act 1960 to ban unconventional gas exploration and extraction, provide for social clauses and public consultation on the granting of leases and ensure greater accountability through initiating an annual review of the lease by an Oireachtas Joint Committee
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhorbairt Pheitriliam agus Mianraí Eile, 1960 chun cosc a chur ar thaiscéaladh agus astarraingt neamhghnách gáis, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le clásail shóisialta agus le comhchomhairle phoiblí i dtaobh deonú léasanna agus chun cuntasacht mhéadaithe a chinntiú trí athbhreithniú bliantúil ar an léas ag Comhchoiste Oireachtais a thionscnamh
bill.shortTitleEn: Petroleum and Other Minerals Development (Amendment) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhorbairt Pheitriliam agus Mianraí Eile (Leasú), 2016
